response.overview: A football player and his mates travel to the planet Mongo and find themselves fighting the tyranny of Ming the Merciless to save Earth.
response.tagline: Pathetic earthlings...who can save you now?
response.title: Flash Gordon

titles.title: フラッシュ・ゴードン

cast.name: Jill Goldston
cast.character: Flashback Friend of Dr. Hans Zarkov (uncredited)
